channel.title: MusicThe.Net – Another Ratio Free Music Tracker With Open Signups
channel.description:
MTN is a small, start up tracker that’s only about two weeks old so comparing it to the likes of What.CD or Waffles.Fm would be pointless. However, we never consider ‘being new’ ‘or being small’ good enough reasons to dismiss/trash a BitTorrenttracker (or any other site for that matter). For the 10 or so days it has been online, MTN has added around 350 new torrents. Most of these are scene/p2p releases but a good number of exclusive torrents such as discographies and collections are already indexed.
[URL=http://filenetworks.blogspot.com/2010/01/musicthenet-another-ratio-free-music.html]more[/URL] [URL=http://www.musicthe.net]MTN[/URL] no idea how well this site will go, its got a lot of heavy competition, but it might be worth registering for now just to see if it gets anywhere

Tracker has new owners who really care about the Safety of data contained on the server. At the same time we want to sever ties with the former owners of the (rumors).
[/quote]

item.dc:creator: @legia legia
item.description:
@legia wrote:

Feel free to register on the website. Every day, a large dose of fresh music.

As of today, is 83 categories, 867 registered users more than 900 torrents. These numbers are still changing with the increase of users.

[b]We are looking for those responsible for the crew and people to the bracket.

I invite you all to register[/b] - http://musicthe.net/
